articles.title: Bangladesh name Shakib Test captain for third time
articles.description: Cricket News: Bangladesh appointed all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan as Test captain for a third time on Thursday after Mominul Haque quit following a poor run of form.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Real Madrid sign defender Antonio Rudiger from Chelsea
articles.description: Real Madrid have agreed a deal to sign Germany international defender Antonio Rudiger on a free transfer with his contract with Premier League club Chelsea expiring, both clubs said on Thursday.
